commercial_options.yes: Yes, the material can be used for commercial purposes
commercial_options.NC: No, others cannot use the material for commercial purposes

modify_and_build_options.dont_care: And, the may choose their own license

modify_and_build_options.share_alike: But, they have to use the same license as this resource (be aware that this might cause complications for usage of your resource)

creative_commons.title: Yes, with Creative Commons license

no_clearance.title: No
no_clearance.important_notice: Copyright legislation prevents you from publishing other peoples work. We recommend that you gain license from the owner

questions.usage_cleared_with_owner: Is the usage cleared with the owner?
